attributes.action: Provide Covid-19 vaccines to be used by British nationals living in Thailand.
attributes.additional_details: The Thai government has a "Thais first" policy, leaving many vulnerable British nationals at risk. There are reports that British nationals residing outside of Bangkok have not been able to register for vaccination. The British Embassy in Bangkok has been contacted but their only advice is to wait for the Thai government to issue vaccines to us.
attributes.background: In response to the growing number of Covid-19 cases in Thailand, we request that the British government sends vaccines to registered British nationals living in Thailand.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Supply Covid-19 vaccinations for British citizens living overseas
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586772
